EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR.Send Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Self-Service: Speeding Your Convenience Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customers are looking for self-service options now more than ever.
And with self-checkouts, you can deliver. But the benefits don’t stop with your customers: self-checkouts offer surprisingly powerful benefits for {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}’s backend operations, too.
Join the webinar <[[https://my.demio.com/ref/Qw4v0v1w3mQ2mnbm]]> for a fast-paced, engaging exploration of the transformative effects of self-checkout for c-stores in the age of COVID and beyond.
You’ll hear from industry leaders, our own self-checkout expert and a top convenience retailer, plus explore actual usage trends, operational benefits and more. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Webinar Title: Making “Seamless” a Reality for Your C-store Date: October 15, 2020 Time: 2pm Eastern
Participants:
-
Greg Buzek, IHL Group - President
-
Steven O’Toole, NCR - VP of Convenience and Fuel Retail Sales
-
Alan Meyer, Meyer Oil Company - Chief Executive Officer ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
